pageTitle: Public events for November 4, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, November 4, 2015:

Ottawa

1:30 p.m. 

The Prime Minister hosts a Google Hangout with schoolchildren immediately after his swearing-in ceremony. It can be accessed at: YouTube.com/pmcanada

The public and media will be invited to follow the conversation online.

During this Google Hangout, the Prime Minister will converse with schoolchildren from five schools across Canada in a bilingual session.

What is a Google Hangout?

A Google Hangout is a free instant messaging and live video chat that people can watch from their computer or mobile device.

How to watch?

Simply visit the Prime Minister's YouTube channel and watch the Hangout live, just like a regular YouTube video.

Notes for media:

  • All Canadians are invited to follow this event.

Ottawa

2:30 p.m. - The Prime Minister holds the first Cabinet meeting. A media availability will follow in the Foyer.

House of Commons Foyer
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Media Relations: 613-627-2384
